Home Departments Achievements Team

The Official Canister Satellite (CanSat) Team of DJ Sanghvi
Imagination Deployed

We build a fully functional miniature satellite integrated with space technology.

We participate each year at the annual International Cansat Competition , conducted by the American Astronomical Society (AAS) in collaboration with NASA.

Departments

Electronics

The Electronics Department tests, calibrates and integrates the system design of the CanSat along with looking after uninterrupted communication and intensive testing.

Coding

The Coding Department looks after the programming aspects of the Graphic User Interface which displays the real time plotting of data recieved from the sensors present in the CanSat.

Mechanical

The Mechanical Department caters to the testing, manufacturing and designings an aerodynamically sound CanSat which is tested for maximum efficiency.

The Electronics Team

The Electronics department tests, designs and manufactures all the electronics of the CanSat design and ensures that they meet with the optimal results.

The members collaborate for the optimum sensor selection and it's testing for the proposed CanSat, followed by calibration and integration with the help of a structured code. which are then integrated together on a PCB, designed and manufactured by the Electronics department.

The department also overlooks the communication and telemetry of all the sensor collected data.

The Coding Team

The main aspects of Coding department revolve around the concepts of communication and data-transfer. Along with developing the Graphical User interface (GUI) for live plotting of the telemetry data, it is also responsible for maintaining the logs in CSV.

This department's primary responsibility is to ensure successful wireless transmission and relay communication of sensor data between the payloads, container, and ground station.

Being in charge of subsystem code compilation and finalization of algorithms,programming languages ,acceptable telemetry format and developement environments to be utilised are also decided here.

The Mechanical Team

We learn every aspect of the CanSat design in the mechanical department of DJS Arya and ensure that the best results are achieved.

The department performs a significant role in CanSat designing, manufacturing, from selecting the correct materials to assembling the physical components, to delivering a streamlined, aerodynamic result.

Starting from scratch, the members collaborate to build a complete three-dimensional model of the proposed CanSat, which complies with the mission statement.
